title: Install and Set Up
description: Get AutoTester ready in your browser
content:
**Install Extension**
• Get AutoTester from Chrome Web Store and pin to toolbar

**Create Project**
• Click AutoTester icon and create new project
• Add project name, app URL, and brief description

**Verify Connection**
• Check extension shows active status with your app

title: Record User Actions
content:
**Start Recording Session**
• Open your web app in the same browser tab
• Click AutoTester extension and press 'Start Recording'

**Perform Complete Workflow**
• Fill out all forms with realistic data
• Click all buttons and navigation links
• Complete the full process from start to finish

**Include Test Scenarios**
• Test both success and error scenarios
• Try edge cases and different user patterns

**Finish Recording**
• Stop recording when done
• Review captured actions in AutoTester
• Verify all critical steps were recorded

title: Define Test Validations
description: Set up checkpoints for your tests
content:
**Review Your Recording**
• Go through recorded actions and mark critical validation points

**Set Verification Checkpoints**
• Success/error messages after form submissions
• Required field validations and page navigation
• Data persistence across page transitions

**Configure Test Assertions**
• Element visibility, text content, and URL changes
• Form validation behaviors and loading states

**Ensure Complete Coverage**
• Test both positive and negative scenarios
• Include edge cases and error conditions

title: AI Generates Comprehensive Test Cases
description: Let AI create your complete test strategy
content:
**AI Analysis**
• AI reviews your recording and creates smart test scenarios
• Processes user actions to build comprehensive tests

**Auto-Generated Tests**
• Happy path tests for normal user flows
• Error tests for invalid inputs and edge cases
• Form validation and navigation tests
• Cross-browser compatibility checks

**Review & Customize**
• Check the generated test suite covers your needs
• Add or modify tests as needed
• Adjust priorities based on what matters most

title: AI Creates Executable Test Steps
description: AI converts test scenarios into detailed automation scripts
content:
**Smart Script Creation**
• AI turns test scenarios into ready-to-run scripts
• Complex workflows become simple step-by-step code

**Complete Package**
• Element selectors for buttons and fields
• Test data and expected results
• Smart page loading waits
• Cross-browser compatibility

**Reliable & Clean**
• Stable, efficient scripts you can modify
• Smart retry logic for flaky elements
• Proper test cleanup

**Quality Assured**
• AI reviews every script for completeness
• Covers all test scenarios with helpful documentation

title: Execute and Monitor
content:
**Run Tests**
• Execute your complete test suite in AutoTester
• Watch tests run in real-time with live monitoring

**Review Results**
• See pass/fail status for each test
• Get screenshots and error details for failures
• View performance metrics and timing

**Fix Issues**
• Identify bugs and user experience problems
• Prioritize fixes based on test impact
• Improve your app and testing strategy
